query.text: ----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: owl_individual_of(I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T), owl_has(I, knowrob:'designator', D), mng_designator_props(D, 'TF-PREFIX', Prefix), add_stickman_visualization('human1', openni_human:'iai_human_robot1', T, '', Prefix).
query.text: What was the pose of the Human when intrusion events occurred?

query.q: owl_individual_of(I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T), add_agent_visualization('_', boxy:'boxy_robot1', T, '', '').
query.text: What was the pose of the Robot when intrusion events occurred?

query.q: owl_individual_of(I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T0), owl_has(I, knowrob:'endTime', T1), owl_has(I, knowrob:'designator', D), mng_designator_props(D, 'TF-PREFIX', Prefix), atom_concat(Prefix, 'lefthand', Link), add_trajectory(Link, T0, T1, 0.1).
query.text: What was the right hand trajectory of the Human during intrusion events?
